name: ChartLegend
description: Represents the legend in a chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart legend, which includes fill and font formatting.

properties.name: legendEntries
properties.description: Represents a collection of legendEntries in the legend.

properties.name: showShadow
properties.description: Represents if the legend has a shadow on the chart.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Represents the height, in points, of the legend on the chart. Null if legend is not visible.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Represents the left, in points, of a chart legend. Null if legend is not visible.

properties.name: overlay
properties.description: Boolean value for whether the chart legend should overlap with the main body of the chart.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Represents the position of the legend on the chart.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Represents the top of a chart legend.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: A boolean value the represents the visibility of a ChartLegend object.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Represents the width, in points, of the legend on the chart. Null if legend is not visible.
